title: Has Technology Ruined the Design Process?
description: After a brief detour about softball, Laura and Larry talk about getting ahead of ourselves thanks to technology and how technology has allowed us to move away from process – and not always to our benefit.
itunes:subtitle: After a brief detour about softball, Laura and Larry talk about getting ahead of ourselves thanks to technology and how technology has allowed us to move away from process – and not always to our benefit.
